name: Utopia
summary: Utopia was a browser-based strategy game where each player manages a province within a kingdom, collaborating with other players to grow their territories and strengthen their kingdom. Players build and manage resources like food, housing, and military defenses on their land, and engage in real-time attacks and espionage against other provinces. The game emphasizes teamwork, strategic planning, and timing as players balance growth, defense, and warfare to lead their kingdom to dominance.
